mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from member where status in('활성','블랙') and user_category=#{category} and singo_count>=20 order by idx desc)a )b where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select count(*) from member where status in('활성','블랙') and user_category=#{category}
select name from member where idx=#{idx}
